infotexts.entitydescription.deusizine.mod: An opiate made using exotic materials on Europa. It lasts way longer than its earthly counterparts, and, strangely enough, causes no addiction.
infotexts.entitydescription.combatstimulantsyringe: A highly advanced stimulant that's capable of completely block the sense of pain.
infotexts.entitydescription.antibiotics.mod: A mild antibiotic that acts against a wide range of disease-causing bacteria, though with the side effect of minor organ damage. Used as an ingredient in many medical compounds. More effective against internal infection.
infotexts.entitydescription.antibloodloss1.mod: A sodium chloride infusion mimicking the fluids in human body.
infotexts.entitydescription.antibloodloss2.mod: Pack of substances that act like Blood Plasma. Mildly useful in the treatment of blood loss.
infotexts.entitydescription.lithiummonoxide: An extremely basic substance discovered on earth but was only able to be mass produced on Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.pacifiedhusk: A specialized anti-bacteria drug made by carefully conditioned Velonaceps Calyx. Must be applied by experienced medics.
infotexts.entitydescription.icepack: What year is it that you still think this is traditional ice pack? This pack of advanced chemical is able to absorb large amount of heat on demand.
infotexts.entitydescription.heatpack: Powerful thermal agent utilizing thermite reaction.
infotexts.entitydescription.enzyme: Organic catalyst, useful in inducing organic reactions.
infotexts.entitydescription.immunebooster: Arcane substances only known by historians. Only Jove knows how this one can boost the patient's immune system without noticeable side effects.
infotexts.entitydescription.disinfectant: Classic chemical that's very effective against ranges of microbes. Can be traced back to earth. Do not drink.
infotexts.entitydescription.liquidbag: An empty bag used to contain liquids(or solids). Apply it on any limbs with ice/heat packs to remove them.
infotexts.entitydescription.raw_blood: Fresh blood extracted from patients. Process before use.
infotexts.entitydescription.proc_blood: Processed blood that's safe to use and good for long term storage.
infotexts.entitydescription.transfusionset: A device used for transfering large amounts of liquids in or out of the body.
infotexts.entitydescription.alpha_stim: Alien medicine that can rapidly heal damages to organs and flesh.
infotexts.entitydescription.beta_stim: Well known Europan medicine that stimulates organ regeneration.
infotexts.entitydescription.gamma_stim: Coalition-developed experimental substance that induces organ growth. Use with care.
infotexts.entitydescription.heatclothes: The Underwater Operation Uniform provides protections against common harzards when operating in wet and underwater environments. It can also utilize Incendium Crystals and built-in computer to provide heat on demand.
infotexts.bloodsampler.title: Result:
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodsampler: A device used to determine the type of blood quickly.
infotexts.entitydescription.aspirin: A classic and effective nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug.
infotexts.entitydescription.traumafix: A substance used to treat Chronic Pain.
infotexts.entitydescription.scalpel: Surgical Scalpels are mainly used to create incision, but can also be used like a knife.
infotexts.entitydescription.scissors: Surgical Scissors are mainly used to sulture wounds. Nevertheless, its sharp edges can hurt.
infotexts.entitydescription.stapler: Surgical Staplers are handy tools that can sulture blood vessles together precisely or to create small wounds good for sampling blood.
infotexts.entitydescription.sulture: Surgical threads that can be naturally absorbed by human body.
infotexts.entitydescription.coldcrate: Refrigerates contained items on demand when powered.
infotexts.entitydescription.anestheticgas0: A tank of Nitrous oxide, a weak inhaled anaesthetic.
infotexts.entitydescription.anestheticgas1: A tank of Desflurane, a strong inhaled anaesthetic.
infotexts.entitydescription.vitamins: Vitamins are critical to human's health, but only a few greedy individuals know how to make it.
infotexts.entitydescription.analgesicgas0: A tank of extremely powerful but short-lasting analgesic gas that doesn't cause too much addiction.
infotexts.entitydescription.Phenothiazine: An antipsychotic drug mildly toxic to humans, considerably toxic to microbes, and extremely toxic to parasites.
infotexts.entitydescription.incendiumpack: Heat pack utilizing the alien material incendium crystal. Lasts way longer and is more powerful compared to plain its counterpart based on thermite reaction.
infotexts.entitydescription.stabOxygenite: Processed Liquid Oxygenite that are ready to be injected without causing any harms.
